snippet: A state lawyer urged a judge to dismiss a suit challenging positive language in a measure on the Nov. 5 ballot that would expand gambling in New York.
abstract: New York State Board of Elections urges Judge Richard M Platkin to dismiss suit challenging statewide casino referendum, saying the case was filed too late and too close to Election Day; suit alleges that ballot abstract for referendum contains prejudicial advocacy language promoting its passage.
lead_paragraph: A state lawyer urged a judge to dismiss a suit challenging positive language in a measure on the Nov. 5 ballot that would expand gambling in New York.

headline.main: Judge to Decide Next Week in Casino Referendum Suit
headline.print_headline: Judge to Decide Next Week In Casino Referendum Suit
